events.name: Endurance Z2 - 2h30 (OUTDOOR)
events.description: Warm-up 15 min easy; main set 2h endurance Z2 at 62–71% FTP (~200–230W); cadence 85–95 rpm; fuel start within 15 min, 60–80 g carbs/hr, 600–800 ml fluids/hr; cool down 10 min.

events.name: Tempo - 3x8' @ 80–85% (INDOOR)
events.description: Warm-up 10 min; 3 intervals 8 min @ 80–85% FTP (250–267W) with 4 min easy recovery; cadence 85–95 rpm; cool down 10 min. AMBER/RED fallback: VO2-lite 5x2' @ 110–115% FTP or SS 3x12' @ 88–92% FTP.
